alert.note: Alert for Juab; Sanpete; Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 8:41PM MDT until July 19 at 9:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Sanpete County in central Utah... East central Juab County in central Utah... South central Utah County in northern Utah... * Until 915 PM MDT * At 840 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles southeast of Rocky Ridge, or 11 miles northeast of Nephi, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Birdseye and Indianola. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 237 and 238. US Route 6 between mile markers 189 and 191. US Route 89 between mile markers 290 and 310. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
